name: Ninja Baseball
blurb: Who needs bats & balls when you have swords & stars?  Take your team of shadow warriors and duke it out on the baseball diamond!

rewards.reward: We'll e-mail you a digital Ninja Baseball Card with your name on it!  Thanks for your support!
You'll receive the digital card AND a postcard with exclusive art, signed by Ted and Todd!
You'll get the digital card, signed postcard, AND a key to download the game... with your name in the credits!

This is the "Player Pack!"  You get an exclusive DVD case with the game, and your name in the game as a player!  It also includes the digital card, signed postcard, download key, and a listing in the credits!

If you'd like to put clothes on our back AND on your own, here's the tier for you!  You will receive a super soft t-shirt, designed by us and printed by a local company in Eugene, Oregon.  You'll also receive the "Player Pack!"

Design a team that will be in everyone's game!  Their home, name, mascot, and colors are all up to you.  (keep it earth-bound and clean, assassin!)  You'll receive a custom 8x10 glossy of your team, and a character with your name will be their default manager in the game, if you wish.  You'll also get the "Player Pack!"

Our friends at B.R.T. Bladeworks have offered to craft limited-edition Throwing Stars for this campaign!  (Wow!)  Choose this tier, and you'll get a Throwing Star, certificate of authenticity, and the "Player Pack."

If you prefer snuggly soft ninjas, then this tier is for you!  You'll receive a hand-made, felted ninja,  made only for this campaign.  Choose the primary and secondary colors, and it will be crafted with love.  You also get the "Player Pack" and a waiver. (just in case he flips out and unleashes his awesome ninja power)

We'll name an MVP award in the game after you or someone you love!  AND you'll get a copy of the boardgame used to playtest the rules, including the board, dice, and rubber ninjas.  AND you'll get the "Player Pack!"

This is a special tier, made by request!  For this amount, you will receive a throwing star by B.R.T. Bladeworks, a felted ninja, and the "Player Pack."  You also get to design a team, and a surprise "something extra."  Thank you for your support!
You will receive an original, signed drawing by Todd Booth.  You'll also get a signed book of the concept art used in the game, and the "Player Pack."  Nice!

Does this game get you as excited as we are?  Do you also want to have a serious, lasting impact on its development?  Well, then, slide over here!  For this amount, you can pick an upcoming stadium we are building, alter it to your specifications, and name it after you or someone you love.  You will also receive an invitation to a secret group on Facebook, where the developers and other invitees discuss the game.  That's right!  A digital legacy, a large format print to show it off, an all-access backstage pass, and the chance to offer your input.  (Naturally, you'll receive the "Player Pack," too!)
